system.description: Choose one type of weapon (including unarmed strike or grapple) for which you have already selected Weapon Focus. You are especially skilled at using that weapon.
system.prerequisites: Proficiency with selected weapon, Weapon Focus (selected weapon), fighter level 8th
system.benefit: You gain a +1 bonus on all attack rolls you make using the selected weapon. This bonus stacks with other bonuses on attack rolls, including the one from Weapon Focus.
system.special: A fighter may select Greater Weapon Focus as one of his fighter bonus feats.
